If I had a face like yours, I'd sue my parents.
You're so ugly, when you were born the doctor slapped your mother.
I'd agree with you but then we'd both be wrong.
You're the reason the gene pool needs a lifeguard.
I'm not saying I hate you, but I would unplug your life support to charge my phone.
You have two brain cells and they're both fighting for third place.
If laughter is the best medicine, your face must be curing the world.
You're like a cloud. When you disappear, it's a beautiful day.
I'd explain it to you but I don't have any crayons with me.
You're not stupid; you just have bad luck thinking.
It's impossible to underestimate you.
You're the reason they put instructions on shampoo bottles.
You're not the sharpest tool in the shed, but you are a tool.
I've seen more intelligent creatures at the bottom of a cereal box.
You're like a software update - every time I see you, I think 'this could have been an email.'
Your ideas are like expired coupons - not valid anywhere.
If I wanted to kill myself, I'd climb your ego and jump to your IQ.
You're the human version of a '404 Error'.
Your personality is like a screensaver - everyone just waits for you to go away.
You're not a complete idiot - some parts are missing.
Your family tree must be a cactus because everybody on it is a prick.
You're so dense, light bends around you.
I'd call you a tool, but that would imply you're useful.
You have the perfect face for radio.
You bring everyone so much joy... when you leave the room.
I was going to give you a nasty look, but you already have one.
You're about as useful as a screen door on a submarine.
If you were any more inbred, you'd be a sandwich.
You're like a penny - two-faced and worthless.
I've seen smarter things stuck to the bottom of my shoe.
You're proof that evolution can go in reverse.
Your birth certificate is an apology letter from the condom factory.
You're so fake, Barbie is jealous.
If ignorance is bliss, you must be the happiest person alive.
You have a face for silent film and a personality for mute button.
I'd tell you to go outside, but I think your natural habitat is under a rock.
You're the human equivalent of a participation trophy.
Your future is as bright as a black hole.
You're like a broken pencil - pointless.
If brains were dynamite, you wouldn't have enough to blow your nose.
You're the reason why aliens won't talk to us.
You have the charisma of a damp sponge.
I've met more interesting lint.
You're about as useful as a chocolate teapot.
Your ideas are as useful as a waterproof towel.
You're so boring, you make beige look exciting.
If you were any less interesting, you'd need watering twice a week.
You're the human version of background noise.
You have the personality of a parked car.
You're so basic, you think avocado toast is a personality.
